item.title: My $850 smartwatch can’t render Korean text
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: I recently acquired a Garmin Fenix 6X, currently Garmin’s flagship model. While I did research beforehand, I forgot that my phone was in Korean, and thus the notifications would be in Korean… Silly me.
